title.rendered: Elegear USB C to Lightning Cable [MFi Certified] 3Pack 2M Fast Charging Type C to iPhone Charger Cable Supports Power…

content.rendered:
⚡【MFi Certified】Elegear USB C to lightning cable has accomplished MFi certification necessities. The MFi certification and Elegear strict high quality testing guarantee the security of your units. The prime quality copper wire helps quick information transferring up to 480Mbp/s, serving to you to switch information, music, motion pictures, footage rapidly and stably.
⚡【Power Delivery Fast Charging】Charge your iPhone 12 from 0% to 50% in simply 30 minutes. Elegear sort C to lightning cable helps quick charging for iPhone 12, 12 Mini, 12 Pro, 12 Pro Max, 11, 11 Pro, 11 Pro Max, SE, X, XS, XR, XS Max, 8, 8 Plus and so forth (together with 18W, 20W, 29W, 30W, 61W, or 87W USB-C Power Adapter).
⚡【New C94 Connector】This iPhone charger cable makes use of the Newest C94 lightning finish which is specifically designed for quick charging, whose colour is totally different from the earlier C48 lightning finish. Charging Speeds 2.5× Faster than USB A to Lightning Cable. It shorten time to cost and enhance your work environment friendly. You can get your telephones charging completed in much less time.
⚡【Premium Materials】Special pressure aid design, this iPhone 11 cable can bear 15000+ bends in strict laboratory exams. Built with powerful copper wire and durable ABS supplies to guarantee the security of cell phone charging. These iPad cables are resistant to splitting and breaking.
⚡【What You Get】3-Pack 6FT Elegear sort C iPhone cables. 6FT cable permits you to work and cost your iPhone or iPad anyplace. 3 pack lightning cables allow you to cost three units concurrently.The charging cable with MFI certification is appropriate for quick charging of iPhone 12, 12 Mini, 12 Pro, 12 Pro Max, 11, 11 Pro, 11 Pro Max, SE, X, XS, XR, XS Max, 8, 8 Plus fashions
